context: Love is a flame that burns so bright. It fills our hearts with pure delight. It's a feeling that we can't ignore. A force that we can't help but adore. Love is patient, love is kind. It's a bond that's hard to find. So cherish love, and hold it dear. For it's a gift that's always near
The antidote for narcissism is love. Love is patient, love is kind, is humble, seeks the welfare of others, sacrificing of self.
Love is patient, Love is kind.  Even if I find it near impossible to love my wife - God doesn't.  So patient and kind is my goal.
Love is eternal, indestructible, and always worth fighting for. Love is patient, love is kind, and love endures forever. Father's rights are God-given.
Love is patient, love is kind. It does not envy, it does not boast, it is not proud. I love you so much dear. Keep moving forward in life... Everything gonna be okay in due time my baby
Love is patient, love is kind, and what our loves express is true. No amount of tragedy can tear, or break the love I have for you
Dammit Elon, help me help you. I love you. Stop being impatient with with me. Love is patient, love is kind.

Of course, love is patient, love is kind but also temperamental. Even mutual love is seasonal. Love has its moments, moments that can make us question it. I'm still learning that love is not an assumption, it's a practice

Love is patient, love is kind. It does not envy, it does not boast, it is not proud. It does not dishonor others, it is not self-seeking, it is not easily angered, IT KEEPS NO RECORD OF WRONGS. Forgive me dear, I love you
Love is patient, love is kind... but mostly patient. Love you babe!! Happy 6 years of marriage today!!

Let all that you do be done in love. Love is that gift from God that binds everything together in perfect harmony. Good night, my dearest darlings. Don't forget to live and love. Remember: love is patient, love is kind

Love is patient, love is kind. Love comes in many different forms. I'm thankful for the realistic love my husband and I have. It's not like in every movie, but it's real. We lack materialism, and it works for us. It was love at first sight for us!
To my wife, I love you!  Love is patient, love is kind.
love is kind and patient, does not seek applause, expects nothing in return, does not bend downward, love is like the wind, you cannot see it, but you feel it

Love is patient, love is kind. Love always forgives, trusts, supports, and endures. Love never fails. When every star in the heavens grows cold, and when silence lies once more on the face of the deep, three things will endure: faith, hope, and love.
Love is patient, love is kind, love is forgiving. Love openly and freely don't keep it behind closed doors. Be with someone who loves and appreciates you for exactly who you are!!
Love is patient, love is kind. Love is to tolerate your wife. Love you babe
Love is the greatest gift of all. Love is patient, love is kind, peaceful, unconditional and unforgettable. Love heals.

There's the Love and Patience we have for each other then there's Love & Patience we have for others. Kinda the same... yet different. The heart will always wait for what it wants. even if it's painful. Love Changes! Love is Patient, love is Kind. Trust me... it will be worth the wait.
Love is caring for someone or a thing. It's a universal language that cuts across traditions, and cultures. We speak it daily. Love is patient, love is kind
Love is patient, love is kind. It is always ready to excuse, to trust, to hope, and to endure whatever comes.
See love everywhere. There nothing that beats Love is patient, love is kind.

Love is patient, love is kind. Love is deliberate. Love is hard. Love is pain and sacrifice. Above all, to me, its seeing the darkness in another person and defying the impulse to jump ship. My point is this, LOVE GENUINELY... LOVE BEYOND THE PHYSICAL. Real Life.
Today's Goal: I will tell my wife and children that I love them and  will be specific as to why. Love is patient, love is kind.

LOVE IS NOT BLIND BECAUSE WE CAN SEE IT! The wicked world is wrong about the definition of LOVE, but the wise word is right! IT IS WRITTEN: Love is patient, love is kind. It does not envy, it does not boast, it is not proud... LOVE NEVER FAILS.
Love is patient, Love is Kind. I love you Kristy Lumpkin Stone.
Today I celebrate my children. They are indeed the loves of my life. They are also my hands-on practice of 1 Corinthians 13: 4-8 which says, Love is patient, love is kind.
Love is patient, love is kind and what our love express is true, no amount of tragedy can tear or break the love I have for you. Feel the presence of love wrapped up within a hug.
Love is patient, love is kind. love is safe. love is no judgement. love is infinite.
When the love is patient and kind, it is worthy to 'fight' for.
